name: ifta_report.combined_distance
description: Combines archived precomputed IFTA mileage with new canonical distance based IFTA mileage based on switchover date.

metadata.comment: The hour interval over which this data is aggregated.
The device ID of the vehicle that was driven.
The jurisdiction where this distance was driven. This value will be the state/province code derived from `kinesisstats.location.revgeo_state`.
A boolean indicating whether or not this aggregated row is imported from `reportsdb` (v1).
The distance driven in meters during this hour. This value is derived from canonical distance when `historical=false`.
The GPS derived distance driven in meters during this hour.
The odometer derived distance driven in meters during this hour.
The toll distance driven in meters during this hour. This value is derived using `kinesisstats.location.toll` and canonical distance.
The off highway distance driven in meters during this hour. Derived from kinesisstats.osdlocationwithroadcontext IFTA geofence exemption types. Historical v1 data will have 0.0 for this field.
The private road distance driven in meters during this hour. Derived from kinesisstats.osdlocationwithroadcontext IFTA geofence exemption types. Historical v1 data will have 0.0 for this field.
